code: import produce from"immer";import{ActionType}from"../action-types";var initialState={};var reducer=produce(function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ActionType.BUNDLE_START:state[action.payload.cellId]={loading:true,code:'',err:''};return state;case ActionType.BUNDLE_COMPLETE:state[action.payload.cellId]={loading:false,code:action.payload.bundle.code,err:action.payload.bundle.err};return state;default:return state;}});export default reducer;
